Hi Everyone,


I've been hacking around with some code trying to see how turbidity 
changes my rendering, so far I can't see to find any change in my 
images. Which leads me to suppose that I must be doing something wrong. 
I'm using the commands in *Bold* which result in the world.rad files below.




Another question.


I'm actually interested in simulating turbidity underwater, don't know 
if anyone can comment upon whether the turbidity numbers for air relate 
to those for water? Is there a better renderer for such things.


Best wishes,


George
